channel.title: New Project
channel.description:
Well, I haven't posted anything new for a while now and I thought I would get back to that old messenger I made. So, I made a newer version, it is a lot better and more reliable. It glitches out though when you minimize it. So just don't minimize it, whatever you do. It can go under a window, but just not minimized.
Alright, I'll send the client out, but the server stays with me :) Whoever wants to can use. I'm also putting the client's source code :)
Any suggestions what so ever, please feel free to post.

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

I think its better to leave it hidden if the server is not on. That way… it would not bother you and when i turn on the server, it could just connect and then you would be on

Read full topic

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

you coulda checked jar for main class but main class is messenger.java

EDIT:
btw, i was offline for a little so you probably couldn’t connect. It waits until it’s connected for the frame to show

Alright just restarted server, try now lol.

Read full topic
